basics.name: Ryan Yeung
basics.role: Schmidt AI in Science Postdoctoral Fellow

work.name: Rotman Research Institute, Baycrest Academy for Research and Education
highlights: Supervised by Dr. Brian Levine and Dr. Brad Buchsbaum.

awards.title: Schmidt AI in Science Postdoctoral Fellowship
awards.summary: The University of Toronto’s Eric and Wendy Schmidt AI in Science Postdocs program boosts the work of early-career scholars in engineering, mathematics and natural science by giving them vital tools in AI.

awards.title: NSERC Postdoctoral Fellowship
awards.summary: The NSERC PDF program provides financial support to a core of the most promising researchers in natural sciences and engineering at a pivotal time in their careers.

awards.title: NSERC Alexander Graham Bell Canada Graduate Scholarship - Doctoral (CGS-D)
awards.summary: The prestigious CGS program allows excellent students to pursue graduate studies in Canada. The objective of the program is to ensure a reliable supply of highly qualified personnel to meet the needs of Canada’s knowledge economy.

certificates.name: Graduate Diploma (GDip) in Computational Data Analytics for the Social Sciences and Humanities (CDASH)
